title: ASCII文本乱码艺术视频映射特效AE插件 L3tt3rM4pp3r2 V2.0 Win/Mac
author: 大众脸
content: L3tt3rM4pp3r2 是一款基于 GPU 加速的 After Effects 文本模式与 ASCII 艺术视频映射插件，支持 Windows 和 Mac 系统。该插件提供重新设计的用户界面和控件，并内置多种经典文本模式预设（如 VGA、CGA 符号集等），可直接用于视频帧到字符艺术的实时映射。适用于制作复古风格、像素化视觉效果及创意文字动画。

translation.en_title: L3tt3rM4pp3r2 V2.0 ASCII Text Glitch Art Video Mapping Plugin for AE (Win/Mac)
translation.en_content: L3tt3rM4pp3r2 is the second version of our GPU-accelerated After Effects plugin, allowing you to display video frames as textmode art. Version 2 includes reworked user controls and contains textmode presets (such as VGA and CGA symbol sets and many more) bundled with the plugin, so you don’t necessarily have to start from making your own textures!

other.note: 访问密码：6688（城通网盘）；提取码：h4pn（百度网盘）
